Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Milwaukee
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Laramie, Irving Park, Cicero and Montrose: due to, construction near Montrose/Milwaukee.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Laramie, Irving Park, Cicero and Montrose: due to, construction near Montrose/Milwaukee.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near Garfield/Wolcott
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via  Garfield, Ashland, 59th, Damen and Garfield: due to, street blockage near Garfield/Wolcott.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via  Garfield, Ashland, 59th, Damen and Garfield: due to, street blockage near Garfield/Wolcott.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Trains bypassing Western (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Western (Forest Park Branch) in both directions due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Western (Forest Park Branch) in both directions due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
